title: Is Akali like Fiora
body: Is Akali like Fiora, because I use Fiora top lane and I'm thinking about getting Akali but I'm wondering if they have a similar playstyle. (plz don't judge, I am still a noob at LoL :D)

replies.body:
no. Fiora you press R to win. Akali you Press Q+R

Similar in that they dive in and are hard to kill due to lifestealing/spellvamping a tonne.
As for actual playing, very different.

Akali recently got a big nerf so not many people play her anymore. She can still be ok though.
Flora's ulti got nerved hard a few patches ago.
Still strong enough to nuke someone with double her kills and lane feed, and take no damage in the process.
if by same play style you mean get steamrolled by every other tanky top laner ever than yes, their playstyle is very similar.
Fiora is more of a duellist than Akali, and Akali is more of an assassin. I haven't personally played either and am going off of champ spotlights and games I've watched.

I guess in some ways you could see them as being similar.


But overall they are very much different.
